value.title: Trim/ remove spaces in a text column Power Query - Power BI Tips & Tricks #29
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how to trim or remove spaces (whitespaces) in Power Query / Power BI  Link to Ken Puls blog if you want to copy the function: http://www.excelguru.ca/blog/2015/10/08/clean-whitespace-in-powerquery/   Looking for a download file? value.title: Easily get an access token for the Power BI Embedded Playground

value.title: The Power BI Smart Narrative visual is INSANE AMAZING!
